articles.description: The great sporting theatre of Goodison Park got the final Merseyside derby it deserved on a spine-tingling night of emotion and chaos, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Everton 2-2 Liverpool: Toffees ensure Goodison Park gets one great last Merseyside derby act

articles.description: Listen to radio commentary and follow text updates as Celtic host Bayern Munich in the Champions League play-off round.
articles.title: Celtic vs Bayern Munich: Uefa Champions League stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Liverpool remain in the driving seat for the Premier League title despite late drama in the Merseyside derby, but how does their run in compare to Arsenal's?
articles.title: Premier League title race: What has Merseyside derby draw done to Liverpool and Arsenal chances?

articles.description: Virgil van Dijk accuses Everton's Abdoulaye Doucoure of provoking Liverpool fans after a fiery Merseyside derby descends into chaos following James Tarkowski's late equaliser.
articles.title: Abdoulaye Doucoure: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk accuses Everton midfielder of provocation in derby clash

articles.description: Captain Jos Buttler rejects the idea England have not trained enough during their difficult tour of India, saying they do not have a "lazy environment".
articles.title: England in India: Jos Buttler says tourists do not have 'lazy environment'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Feyenoord vs AC Milan in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Feyenoord vs AC Milan: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe is considering further redundancies at the club.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ineos considering further redundancies at the club

articles.description: Benfica take control of their Champions League play-off with an away win against a Monaco side that have to play most of the second half with only 10 men.
articles.title: Monaco 0-1 Benfica: Visitors win first leg of Champions League play-off tie

articles.description: England are intent on ending their four-year "hurt" against Scotland when the old rivals meet in the Six Nations, says scrum-half Alex Mitchell.
articles.title: England v Scotland: Alex Mitchell says England want to end Calcutta Cup 'hurt'

articles.description: Pakistan warm up for their Champions Trophy defence with a six-wicket win over South Africa as they pull off the highest one-day international run chase in their history.
articles.title: Pakistan v South Africa: Mohammad Rizwan and Salman Agha hit centuries in record chase
